item.title: POWERshell console to power all plugins
item.description: I do not know about everyone else. I am a rather busy admin and quite fond of powershell and scripting. However, I also have a separate admin account for doing my administrative tasks. Now when you are working with multiple systems, all of which have PowerShell consoles, it can become a little bit of a pain opening a console for Exchange 2010, Operations Manager 2010, Virtual Machine Manager and Service Manager to name a few.
